title: BRIGHT BRAND NEW ONE BED APARTMENT IN PRIME CROWN HEIGHTS! NEWLY UPDATED! 2&5 TR
posting_body: ['Come bask in the beauty and light of this unit!!', 'On maple St right off of Brooklyn ave.', 'this Newly updated 1 Bed 1 Bath apartment is an opportunity you don’t want to miss!', 'Call/Text me', 'My # is (917-960-6536)', 'My name is Shmuel.', 'Apartment amenities:', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Spacious Living/Dining Room', '- Updated bathroom with tub', '- In-unit w/d hookups', '- Modernly tiled', 'Move in date: 9/1', 'Around the corner from the Marketplace, Brooklyn Artisan Bakehouse and Wingate park!!', 'Less than a 10 minute walk to the 2 & 5 train by Sterling St.', 'MUST HAVE GOOD CREDIT AND INCOME', 'Guarantors welcome', 'No broker fee', 'P.S.', "If this apartment doesn't suit your needs, we have hundreds of more apartments to show you, don't hesitate to call!"]
